sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.user_uid ,main.user_cd ,main.user_name ,main.app_code ,main.module_name ,main.function_name ,main.url ,main.parameters ,main.log_source ,main.log_type ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM sys_operation_log_history main LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
